content:
Markets

This is your all-important Market overview section.

To Access, Menu -> Tap Markets. Use the from the Dashboard or whichever section you see the Market Indices is the default landing section

Markets Categories by :

  • Top-Gainers
  • Top-Losers
  • Active by Value
  • Active by Volume
  • Top Gainers By OI%
  • Top Loser By OI%
  • OI Spurts

Filters available by Exchange :

  • NSE
  • BSE

Filters available by Segments :

  • Equity
  • Derivative
  • Commodity
  • Currency
  • Indian Indices (Sector specific and indices specific performances)
  • Global Indices

Global Indices

This is a crucial section showing trading / investing action across all major indices across the Globe. You can get an overview of the worldâ€™s economy to make calculated decisions.
